71.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

93.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

126.movie_plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

17.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

116.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

57.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

109.movie_plot: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

107.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.
